AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Security validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Organizations of the Client with user acces rights
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (TO_NUMBER(@AD_Client_ID@)=0 AND AD_Org.AD_Org_ID=0) OR (TO_NUMBER(@AD_Client_ID@)!=0 AND ((AD_Org.AD_Client_ID IN (@#User_Client@) AND AD_Org.AD_Org_ID IN (@#User_Org@)) OR AD_Org.AD_Org_ID=0 AND AD_Org.IsSummary='N'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Reference List or Table
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Reference.ValidationType=(CASE TO_NUMBER(@AD_Reference_ID@) WHEN 17 THEN 'L' WHEN 25 THEN 'L' WHEN 30 THEN 'S' WHEN 28 THEN 'L' ELSE 'T' END)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType AR/AP Invoices and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR/AP Invoice and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('ARI', 'API','ARC','APC') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(TO_NUMBER(@AD_Org_ID@),C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, TO_NUMBER(@#AD_Client_ID@)) <> -1

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Material Shipments/Receipts
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type Material Shipments and Receipts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('MMR', 'MMS') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(TO_NUMBER(@AD_Org_ID@),C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, TO_NUMBER(@#AD_Client_ID@)) <> -1

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType AR Pro Forma Invoices
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR Pro Forma Invoice

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_PriceList Base
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Base Pricelists need to have same currency

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType PO/SO
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DocType.DocBaseType IN ('SOO', 'POO') AND C_DocType.IsSOTrx='@IsSOTrx@' AND AD_ISORGINCLUDED(TO_NUMBER(@AD_Org_ID@),C_DocType.AD_Org_ID, TO_NUMBER(@#AD_Client_ID@)) <> -1

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Order SO to be invoiced
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: DocStatus NOT IN ('DR','IP') AND InvoiceRule <> 'S' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced) AND IsSOTrx='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner w SO to invoice
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: BPartners with invoices to be invoiced
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner_ID in ( SELECT distinct o.C_BPartner_ID FROM C_Order o INNER JOIN C_OrderLine l ON (o.C_Order_ID=l.C_Order_ID) WHERE o.DocStatus NOT IN ('DR','IP') AND l.QtyOrdered <> l.QtyInvoiced AND o.IsSOTrx='Y' )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='AC' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts User1
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='U1' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts User2
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='U2' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Payment not in BankStatement
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BankStatementLine l WHERE l.C_Payment_ID=C_Payment.C_Payment_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User - Internal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE AD_User.C_BPartner_ID=bp.C_BPartner_ID AND (bp.IsEmployee='Y' OR bp.IsSalesRep='Y'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Invoices and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR/AP Invoice and Credit Memos

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_InOut Receipts of Project
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (M_InOut.C_Project_ID IS NULL OR M_InOut.C_Project_ID=@C_Project_ID@) AND M_InOut.Processed='Y' AND M_InOut.IsSOTrx='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Project based on status and bpartner
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project.projectstatus in ('OP', 'OR') and (C_Project.c_bpartner_id=TO_NUMBER(@C_BPartner_ID@) or '@IsSOTrx@'='N') or C_Project.c_project_id = @c_project_id@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: MA_Sequence in process plan
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: MA_Sequence.MA_Processplan_Version_ID IN (SELECT MA_Processplan_Version_ID FROM MA_Processplan_Version WHERE MA_Processplan_Id=@MA_Processplan_ID@ AND datefrom <= TO_DATE(@Launchdate@) and dateto>TO_DATE(@Launchdate@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Period_ID of selected year
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Period.C_Year_ID IN (SELECT C_Budget.C_Year_ID FROM C_Budget WHERE C_Budget.C_Budget_ID = @C_Budget_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: S_Expense product type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: PRODUCTTYPE = (CASE WHEN @ISTIMEREPORT@ IS NULL THEN 'E' WHEN @ISTIMEREPORT@='Y' THEN 'S' ELSE 'E' END)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org forced
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Filter by a defined Organization as an input AD_Org_Forced

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: MA_Machine not included
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Only lets choose machines not inlcuded on the table.
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MA_MachineStation ms WHERE ms.MA_WorkStation_ID = @MA_WorkStation_ID@ AND ms.MA_Machine_ID = MA_Machine.MA_Machine_ID )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Uom not as product_uom
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_Product_UOM pu WHERE pu.M_Product_ID = @M_Product_ID@ AND pu.C_UOM_ID = td0.C_UOM_ID AND pu.M_Product_UOM_ID <>@M_Product_UOM_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User Alert
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Restrict users to role in alerts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_User.AD_User_ID in (select AD_User_ID from AD_User_Roles where TO_NUMBER(@AD_Role_Id@)=AD_Role_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Role_of_User
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM AD_USER_ROLES A_U_R WHERE A_U_R.AD_ROLE_ID = AD_Role.AD_Role_ID AND A_U_R.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND A_U_R.AD_USER_ID = TO_NUMBER(@AD_User_ID@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Client of Role
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_CLIENT.AD_CLIENT_ID IN (SELECT CLIENTLIST FROM AD_ROLE WHERE AD_ROLE_ID = TO_NUMBER(@Default_AD_Role_ID@))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org of a Role
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM AD_ROLE_ORGACCESS A_R_O, ad_role r WHERE A_R_O.AD_ORG_ID = AD_ORG.AD_Org_ID AND A_R_O.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND A_R_O.AD_ROLE_ID = R.AD_ROLE_ID and r.ad_role_id = @Default_AD_Role_ID@ AND R.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND (LPAD(TO_CHAR(R.USERLEVEL), 1, '1')='S' OR AD_ORG.AD_ORG_ID <> 0) AND A_R_O.AD_ROLE_ID = @Default_AD_Role_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: Current acctschema
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT WHERE C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT.ELEMENTTYPE='AC' AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT.C_ELEMENT_ID=C_ELEMENTVALUE.C_ELEMENT_ID AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_ELEMENT.C_Acctschema_ID=@C_Acctschema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_TAX - C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_LINES
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_TAX.SOPOTYPE<>(SELECT CASE WHEN ISSOTRX='Y' THEN 'P' ELSE 'S' END FROM C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE WHERE C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID=@C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: DocBaseType - Invoices
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_DOCTYPE.DOCBASETYPE IN ('ARI', 'ARC', 'API', 'APC') AND C_DOCTYPE.ISSOTRX = (SELECT ISSOTRX FROM C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE WHERE C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID=@C_TAXREGISTER_TYPE_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Currency of PriceList
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Sets the currency of the pricelist
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Currency.C_Currency_ID IN (SELECT C_Currency_ID FROM M_Pricelist WHERE M_Pricelist_ID = @M_Pricelist_ID@)
